# Read input
n = int(input())

# Calculate remainder when dividing by 11
remainder = n % 11

# If remainder is 0 or 2, answer is Yes
if remainder == 0 or remainder == 2:
    print('Yes')
# Else, answer is No
else:
    print('No')

N = int(input())
print("Yes" if 4 <= N <= 7 or N % 4 == 0 or (N - 7) % 4 == 0 else "No")
